column1: #Text=Bolin says : " Come on , I want you to meet my brother , Mako . "
#Text=That was the first time you met ?
#Text=" Mako says : " You know what else is rude ?
#Text=Korra proved to be an amazing pro-bender and a loyal friend .
#Text=She helped me save Bolin when he was taken by the Equalists .
#Text=After going through such a crazy experience , I felt like Korra and I had a powerful connection .
#Text=" Wu says : " So then you smooched her real good , eh ?
